name: NotifySickChill
author: Denis
requirements: This extension is compatible to Python 3.8 and above.

options.name: apiKey
description: Used to authenticate and authorize access to an SickChill API.
Can be found in the settings of the web interface of SickChill.

options.name: processMethod
description: Copy - Copy's the file to your show folder. (And so leaves a copy in your TV Download Dir present);
Move - Moves the file to your show folder. (And so removes the file in your TV Download Dir);
Hard link - Creates a hard link in your shows folder, and leaves the file also in your TV Download Dir;
Symbolic link - Creates a link in your shows folder to the file inside your TV Download Dir. Note: if you remove the file the link also doesn't work anymore!

options.name: forceReplace
description: Force already post-processed files to be post-processed again.

options.name: isPriority
description: Replaces the file even if it exists at higher quality.

commands.name: ping
description: Ping SickChill to check if it is running.
